forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
